mapper.select: SELECT bapeSeq, bapeName, bapeGender, bapeType, bapeAge, bapeWeight, bapeNtrNy, bapehospital, bapeDesc, bapeRegDate, bapeEditDate, bapeUseNy, bapeDelNy, BA_Member_bameSeq FROM ba_petprofile ORDER BY bapeSeq desc

SELECT d.bapeSeq, d.bapeName, d.bapeGender, d.bapeType, d.bapeAge, d.bapeWeight, d.bapeNtrNy, d.bapehospital, d.bapeDesc, d.bapeRegDate, d.bapeEditDate, d.bapeUseNy, d.bapeDelNy, d.BA_Member_bameSeq FROM ba_petprofile d WHERE 1 = 1 AND d.bapeSeq = #{bapeSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ba_petprofile ( bapeName, bapeGender, bapeType, bapeAge, bapeWeight, bapeNtrNy, bapehospital, bapeDesc, bapeRegDate, bapeEditDate, bapeUseNy, bapeDelNy, BA_Member_bameSeq ) VALUES ( #{bapeName} #{bapeGender}, #{bapeType}, #{bapeAge}, #{bapeWeight}, #{bapeNtrNy}, #{bapehospital}, #{bapeDesc}, now(), now(), #{bapeUseNy}, #{bapeDelNy}, #{BA_Member_bameSeq} )
